topic.title: Really active or updated sites?
topic.body: Hi, i love ZeroNet and I've discovered and learned a lot here, but many of its pages are not updated very often, some even have 2015 content. Is there a place here where your users are more active?

1525300121_1CF6pbgXdwTsK1JEmKtnfvrfpaFXC.body: like many others: CP, on image boards people post cp even if the subject of the thread is about a complete different thing.

1524903149_173pXRMqj6vLLVMV92FuyxAJWmcD5.body: like 1 year, but lately i found interesting things here, so I'm more active
